text: comprising of four variants, each having a different average monthly balance starting from Rs.1 lakh to Rs.10 lakhs and variable level of insurance cover and concession in service charges is launched now

Individuals/ Sole-proprietorship concerns/Joint Hindu Families/ Partnership Firms/ Limited Companies/ Trusts / Non-corporate bodies like Clubs, Committes, Association etc / Schools, Colleges / Societies can open this account

table.key:
SUPREME CURRENT ACCOUNT - Average Monthly Balance  (AMB) * 
 Mode of calculation:
value: Average of daily closing clear balance in the account spread over a period of one month subject to maintenance of 50% of the stipulated AMB as the minimum balance on every day.
